select
from token_usage where id = #{id} and is_deleted = 0

select call_type as callType, sum(input_tokens) as inputTokens, sum(output_tokens) as outputTokens, sum(total_tokens) as totalTokens, count(*) as callCount from token_usage where user_id = #{userId} and is_delete = 0 and create_time between #{startTime} and #{endTime} group by call_type

SELECT user_id, sum(input_tokens) AS input_tokens, sum(output_tokens) AS output_tokens, sum(total_tokens) AS total_tokens FROM token_usage WHERE create_time BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime} GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_tokens DESC LIMIT #{n}
